review: Easy set up. Great picture and sound. Not as many apps as my Roku, but for the grandkids room, it is sufficient. If you have Amazon Prime, it is definitely a plus. Once you sign in, it welcomes you by name and has any app you have purchased through Amazon already loaded. I was able to view my security cameras at work because I had purchased the IP Camera Viewer from them.
